description:
Favaro Leone is a young bounty hunter who, after meeting http://anidb.net/ch69468 [Amira], ends up traveling with her in her quest to meet her mother.
Favaro is a young man with an orange hair styled into an afro, and green eyes. He has a large X-shaped scar on his face. He wears a rather sparse armor consisting of left pauldron, plate on his left elbow, plates on both of his knees and plated boots. He also wears a bounty hunter bracer. After "forging" a contract with Amira, Favaro gains a demonic tail.
Source: Shingeki no Bahamut Wikia
name: Favaro Leone
